Articles.Content:
K&S Technologies Group
Construction Site Part 2
(See more below)

 

This is Part 2 of a series of Construction Site videos. Part 3 is in the works and we plan to have more exciting equipment to view. Thanks for watching!


I was recently asked where does all the time go between videos? So I thought I'd share that here.
The time between videos most often is the amount of time it takes to produce these craft with most of the time going to filming, burnouts & complications like craft not holding together from not using mods or advanced tweakables. 
The game is not designed to build many of the craft we build and often we push the boundaries on physics.
In the early years of building I found it more fun and challenging to build without these Mods and recently started using advanced tweakables because the videos where becoming a lot of the work.
This Video is the first to have a Mod used, it's called Vessel Mover. This Mod has been a huge help with these projects. 
In the past I built carts to move craft around for filming or added wheels to get them to the water, this is a very fun and challenging thing to do but very time consuming process also. 
My friend Klond is never in a hurry when working on these projects and has the understanding we play KSP to have fun, relax and don't make things pressing. This is one of the reasons we enjoy working together. The nice comments and interest like this is what helps to keep our drive alive (Knowing all the work is being enjoyed by others also).﻿
